pr_title: fix: include 'ksql.streams.topic.*' prefix properties on LIST PROPERTIES output

timeline.message: fix: include 'ksql.streams.topic.*' prefix properties on LIST PROPERTIES output
fix: include 'ksql.streams.topic.*' prefix properties on LIST PROPERTIES output

timeline.bodyText: heh.. this is a neat trick. I guess there's no other option to get these configs without reflection and just manually adding them?
timeline.author: agavra

replies.bodyText: Right. I was thinking of manually creating the list, but TopicConfig can change in the future, and we'll have to adjust every time it changes. I'm not a fan of reflection, but I like the magic on it. This magic helps to forget about changes in TopicConfig as long as they stay public.
replies.author: spena
